Phase45Description: Elder Akos appears unwilling to continue on into Eriman's Pyre. I should speak with him.
Phase22Description: I need to look around Eriman's Pyre to find the pieces of the ledger that Elder Akos mentioned.
Phase0Description:
Elder Akos wants to find a record of the Zakarum inquisition that took place at Eriman's Pyre.

He has asked me to bring him there to search for a ledger.
Phase25Description: I should deliver the remains of the ledger to Elder Akos in Wejinhani.
Callback18Header: Go to Eriman's Pyre with Elder Akos
Toast: Elder Akos wants to piece together the dark history of Eriman's Pyre.
Name: Closing the Book
